notesStmt.note: Many of the leaves are damaged. Half of the lower part of folio 27 is lost, and the upper margin of folios 142-150 is torn off.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: An Arabic commentary on the books of Numbers and Deuteronomy (fragments).

collation.p: Imperfect at the beginning and at the end. Lacunae after folios 2, 4, 5, 13, 14, 20, 27, 56, 76, 82, 88, 89, 107, 111, 135, 141.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: A Naskhi hand of the 12th or 13th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house binding, red and beige. Spine: 'Commentary on Deuteronomy and Numbers. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental Ms. 2562.'
